We got a detailed bid from them.  Once we decided to move ahead with the work, Roger and his team (Michael and Rupert) came to our house the same day to start the work. Since Jan 2023, we have been using Purselley Pools for weekly pool maintenance, service, and needed repairs.

In the office, Emilie has always been friendly, courteous, professional, and 100% responsive to all our pool needs.

The field manager/supervisor Roger is friendly, courteous, professional, and keeps us well-informed - in detail - of the repairs, maintenance, and parts needed for any problems that arise. He is prompt to respond and to efficiently correct the problems, and we appreciate h

Purselley built our pool three years ago and has been maintaining it ever since. They did a fantastic job from start to finish, and the pool still looks and performs like new. Their team is professional, reliable, and responsive. Special thanks to Rupert, their lead, who made sure everything went smoothly and according to plan. Highly recommend Purselley for both construction and ongoing maintenance!

We have had several pool companies service our pool since 1991. We finally called Purselley 20 years ago and it was the best pool decision we have made.  They are prompt - we never wait more than a day for a tech to show up. They are professional - always solving the problem. Their techs are friendly and obliging - they will go above and beyond to be certain that we are satisfied.  We like them so much that we had them completely remodel our pool.  It looks fantastic!

Purselley Pools has been doing the weekly maintenance and needed repairs on my pool for a few years. They are always very professional and efficient. They have given me estimates before they do any additional work. Their prices are reasonable. I would highly recommend them for any professional service.

Been working with Purselley for a few years now.  Always responsive and helpful with every component of my pool/spa.  Roger always communicates well.  Their tech who cleans and adds chemicals is also extremely friendly and reliable.  Even brings treats for my dog every week, which she appreciates.

We’ve had difficulty finding a reliable pool service company, that is until we began using Purselley.  They provide consistent quality service for our regular pool maintenance.  Earlier this year, we worked with Baron Purselley and his team on a pool redesign to incorporate a spa into the existing pool.  Rupert Reyna oversaw the project.  He went above and beyond to help us address any issues that came up and continues to be available whenever we call or text.

Our experience with Purselley Pools was outstanding from start to finish. I emailed the company early Monday morning for a quote to replaster our pool and by Thursday they were already working. We selected a pebble finish from variety of samples they provided for us to chose from. See the before and after photos to see how good of a job they did. The owner was very accommodating and got the pool done while we were on vacation.

Purselley Pools performed a pool inspection for us in Fort Worth.Everything was handled very professionally. The results were  made available to us immediately including photos of the references pool items. We can now confidently continue with our home purchase. thank you.

I wish I could give 6 stars.  Purselly has never disappointed when I’ve called for repairs. Roger is outstanding.  He listens to my perception of the problems and provides valuable insight into potential resolution across varying range of costs. Highly recommend their services

I am pleased to be writing this recommendation for Purselley Pools. I struggled with getting my pool serviced, so as to find a reliable, on time, on schedule service provider and the answer to it all was Purselley Pools. I would like to specifically call out Roger, who was thorough in his explanation, kind, on time and was honest and up front. I appreciate you very much Roger and my pool is in excellent hands. Jose always arrives on time (as Roger had promised), is so prompt with service and act

Purselley Pools has been great to work with. My pool has never looked so good. They service my pool every week and quick to respond if any maintenance issues come up. I highly recommend them if you’re looking for a great pool service and maintenance company.

Can’t say enough great things about Purselley. They always show up when they say they will, main office is so pleasant to deal with and excellent with communication. They have been servicing the pool at our current home for over 20 years and are so accommodating!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Exceptional service from start to finish! The receptionist was incredibly professional, taking the time to collect all necessary details and providing to design team for a pool rendering in the survey so my clients could see how their future backyard would look before purchasing their dream home. The craftsmanship is beautiful, and the service exceeded expectations. I highly recommend this team for anyone considering a pool project.

We couldn’t be happier with our experience with Purselley Pools! From the moment we reached out, they were quick to respond and genuinely concerned about helping us. We had been left in a frustrating (and costly) situation after our previous pool company neglected major issues that should have been addressed long ago.

These guys are great!!  They have taken care of our pool for two years now and it always looks great.  They even leave a weekly card with details of the cleaning and any issues.  last week our timer was not functioning as one of the pins had broken.  They fixed this for us no charge!!!  Great people, Great Service!!

Purselley pool service provides such an excellent, high quality service and I am thoroughly impressed with their customer service! In addition to their superb weekly service, Purselley recently repaired tile in my pool and it looks perfect! They are always professional, timely, considerate and are very communicative. I highly recommend Purselley.
Just started with Purselley Pools. Very happy with my decision. The service manager, Roger, has been attentive and very helpful. Appreciate the honesty and hard work.

Just bought a house with a pool and Roger gave me very reasonable and fair repair estimate. I was told by other companies to replace the heater and spa pump but he was able to get it working again with simple repairs. I'm very grateful for these guys, saved me over a couple grand to replace those parts.
They are the best around the HEB area. Responsive and excellent customer service.

I've been trying to fix my pool's algae problem on my own for two weeks with not much progress. I called Purselley, and they came out the same day for the first service. The next day, they cleaned out the filters and cleaned the pool again. Now there's no algae and the water looks crystal clear. Very friendly throughout the process too.
